content: chunky button bag designed by kala patterson the chunky button bag was completely inspired by the yarn i used when worked in single_crochet fantasy natural creates a very dense and sturdy fabric perfect for a bag finished size 12 ½ inches wide 10 ½ inches long materials plymouth yarn s fantasy natural 100 % cotton 100g 140 yards 3 skeins hook us g 4 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions yarn needle 4 large buttons the ones i used came from joann and are about 1 ½ inches wide gauge 14 ½ single_crochet = 4 inches special stiches mesh stich chain 2 skip 2 stitches double_crochet into the next stitch… repeat across row when you get to the end of the row end with a double crochet instructions the body of this bag is worked in single_crochet in one long piece from top to bottom and is then seamed along the sides the handles are worked separately and attatched later the chunky buttons are the perfect finishing touch 1 chain 50 2 work in single_crochet single_crochet until the piece measures 2 inches 8 row 3 chain 5 work one row of mesh stitch 4 work in single_crochet until the piece measures 19 inches 5 chain 5 work 1 row of mesh stitch 6 work 2 more inches of single_crochet 8 row 7 finish off and weave in ends 8 seam up the long ends of the bag using mattress stitch or whip stitch weave in ends 9 make handles 2 chain 9 work in single_crochet until the piece measures 14 ½ inches sew the handles onto the front of the bag weave in ends 10 sew chunky buttons to the front of the bag 11 you re done copyright info this is a free pattern designed by me feel free to use it for your own personal use if you do use it please include a link back to this site
